Title: The Fox's Lair
Writer: Diana Gabaldon (based on the series of books written by), Ronald D. Moore (developed by), Anne Kenney (written for television by)
Actors: Caitriona Balfe, Sam Heughan, Duncan Lacroix, Gary Lewis
Plot: Claire and Jamie return to Scotland, and back to their home, Lallybroch. Away from the nightmares of Paris, they find solace until a letter arrives. Jamie must go and visit his grandfather ...
